stages.intro_zh: 打開底部電池艙，裝入電池及SD/CFexpress記憶卡。向右撥動開關開機，並按螢幕指示設語言、時間等。對準紅點，輕轉鏡頭卡緊即可。半按快門鍵自動對焦，全按拍攝照片。
stages.intro_en: Open the battery compartment, insert battery and SD/CFexpress card. Switch to ON, and set language/time as prompted on the screen. Align the red dot and gently twist the lens until it locks. Half-press shutter for autofocus; fully press to take a picture.

stages.intro_zh: 轉盤或選單可切換單張拍攝與高速連拍。進入錄影選單設定8K或4K畫質錄影。啟用人臉/眼睛偵測追焦，追蹤主體。在設定中開啟防震提升拍攝穩定度。設定選單中配對手機和平板傳輸照片。
stages.intro_en: Use dial/menu to select single shot or high-speed burst. In video menu, select 8K or 4K for video recording. Enable face/eye AF for subject tracking. Enable IBIS in settings for better stability. Use settings to pair with smart devices for photo transfer.

quiz.question_en: What is the maximum video resolution EOS R5 supports?

quiz.question_en: What feature should you enable for blur prevention in long exposure?

quiz.question_zh: 可以用WiFi/藍牙將相片傳到手機嗎？
quiz.question_en: Can you transfer photos to your phone with WiFi/Bluetooth?
How to switch between single shot and burst mode?

stages.intro_zh: 下載Canon Camera Connect，配對WiFi或藍牙開始照片傳送。手機App可無線控制拍照錄影及即時預覽。直接將影像上傳至雲端或社群平台。插入麥克風、閃光燈或其他擴充配件。使用USB-C傳輸線將檔案快速備份到電腦。
stages.intro_en: Download Canon Camera Connect, pair via WiFi/Bluetooth for transfer. The app enables remote shutter, video recording and live view. Directly upload to cloud or social platforms. Attach microphones, flashes or other accessories. Use USB-C cable for fast backup to computer.
